meanings.definition: Showing a decline in mental or physical abilities due to old age.
meanings.sent1: The senile man struggled to remember where he put his glasses.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that forgetfulness is a common senile trait in elderly individuals.
meanings.sent3: Despite being senile, Grandpa still manages to tell the best jokes at family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The once vibrant garden had become senile, with wilting flowers and overgrown weeds.
meanings.sent5: The image of the senile old dog wandering aimlessly tugged at her heartstrings.
